hero.subtitle: A simple, sustainable coconut ecosystem — from farmers to global products.

about.title: What We Do
about.description: COMONDO is building a comprehensive coconut ecosystem—transforming every part of the coconut into valuable products for global markets

what.fullUtilization_desc: We extract value from every part of the coconut—from meat and water to shell and fiber—minimizing waste and maximizing sustainability
what.greenEconomy_desc: Building regenerative supply chains that empower local farmers while delivering premium products to conscious consumers worldwide
what.innovation_desc: Combining traditional coconut wisdom with modern technology to create next-generation products for diverse industries

mission.title: Mission & Vision
mission.mission_text: Turn every coconut into value — with zero waste and positive impact.
mission.vision_text: Build the world’s most trusted coconut brand for a greener economy.

impact.title: Impact & Sustainability
impact.description: Aligned with the UN Sustainable Development Goals, we're building a business that creates positive change

advantage.title: The COMONDO Advantage
advantage.description: Why investors and partners choose to build the coconut economy with us

stats.indonesia_rank: Indonesia Global Rank of Coconut Producers

social.title: Social

full_value_chain.title: Full Value Chain
full_value_chain.desc: From farm to product — quality at every step.

scalable_model.title: Scalable Model
scalable_model.desc: Built to scale — processes and partnerships.

products.title: KOKO Santan
products.description: Premium fresh coconut cream that started our journey—setting new standards for quality and freshness

contact.title: Join the Coconut Revolution
